content.raw_text: Subject: Your payment went through, Wei — thank you for upgrading! From: billing@typeform.com To: wei.li35@example.com Date: Mon, 11 Dec 2023 14:45:27 +0800 Hi Wei, Thank you for completing your payment — your subscription to Typeform Plus is now active! We’ve just securely processed your payment of US $ 59.00, and your subscription is officially renewed. This gives you access to all the perks of Typeform Plus, including unlimited responses, custom branding, logic jumps, integrations, and more — so you can keep building forms that feel truly human and elevate how you collect insights. Your billing details are below: q=Descriptin+Details+Plan+Typeform+Plus+%28monthly%29+Amount+US+%24+59.00+Billing+date+Dec+11%2C+2023+Next+billing+Jan+11%2C+2024+Invoice+%23TF%E2%80%9120231211%E2%80%91Wei&source=desktop&summary=1&conversation=0d1e88bbe545917cb0095dYou can download your receipt any time by visiting your Account → Plan & Billing page. If you have any questions about billing, need help managing your subscription, or want to explore how to get even more out of Typeform, our Support team is always here — just click Help Center in your account. Thanks again for choosing Typeform. We can’t wait to see the great forms you’ll keep building! Wishing you creative momentum, — The Typeform Team

Subject: Oops—we couldn’t process your payment, Lucía From: billing@typeform.com To: lucia.mendez42@example.com Date: Thu, 23 Nov 2023 08:39:15 +0100 Hi Lucía, We hit a snag when trying to process your payment for the Typeform Basic plan—your last charge didn’t go through. No worries, though—we’ve paused your plan for now, but it’s easy to fix. Here’s what happened: we attempted to charge US $ 19.00 on Nov 23, 2023, but the payment was declined by your bank or card provider. This could be due to an expired card, insufficient funds, or a temporary hold. To avoid any disruption in your access, simply update your billing details by visiting your Account → Plan & Billing page. We’ll retry the payment immediately after you update. Your billing summary: Plan: Typeform Basic (monthly) Amount: US $ 19.00 Tried on: Nov 23, 2023 Next retry: Nov 26, 2023 Until your payment is successful, your account will be in limited-access mode—forms will remain live, but downloading responses and premium features are paused until you’re back on track. If you need help updating your card, want to switch plans, or just have questions, our Support team is here to assist. Just click the Help Center link in your account or this email. We value having you in the Typeform family, Lucía, and don’t want you to miss a beat. Let’s sort this out together. Warmly, — The Typeform Billing Team

Subject: Your plan is renewed, Masato — let the creativity continue! From: billing@typeform.com To: masato.sato77@example.com Date: Tue, 12 Sep 2023 16:05:48 +0900 Hi Masato, Great news—your Typeform Essentials (annual) plan has just been renewed, and your creativity can keep flowing without interruption. We’ve securely processed your payment of US $ 99.00 today, September 12, 2023, ensuring you’ll continue to enjoy unlimited responses, advanced collaboration tools, powerful analytics, and seamless integrations throughout the year ahead. Your renewal details Plan: Typeform Essentials (annual) Amount charged: US $ 99.00 Renewal date: Sep 12, 2023 Next renewal: Sep 12, 2024 Invoice number: TF‑20230912‑Masato You can view or download your invoice any time from the Account → Plan & Billing page. Meanwhile, your account remains fully active—feel free to continue building, sharing, and optimizing your forms. We’re here to support you every step of the way. If you’d like tips on boosting response rates, setting up logic jumps, or connecting Typeform with your favourite tools, our Help Center and Support team are just a click away. Thank you for being a valued member of our community, Masato. We’re thrilled to support your projects in the year ahead and can’t wait to see what you’ll create. Cheers to another year of powerful insights and meaningful engagement! Warmly, — The Typeform Team

Subject: Heads up — we couldn’t renew your plan, Anya From: billing@typeform.com To: anya.kovalenko58@example.com Date: Wed, 29 Nov 2023 11:22:09 +0200 Hi Anya, We ran into a problem while trying to renew your Typeform Pro (monthly) plan—your card was declined during the billing attempt today, November 29, 2023. We’ve temporarily paused your plan to avoid overdrafts or repeated failed charges, but you still have a chance to restore uninterrupted access. This is what happened: we attempted to charge US $ 45.00, but the transaction was declined—often it's something like an expired card, a bank hold, or insufficient funds. Don't worry, though: you can easily resolve this by updating your billing info in Account → Plan & Billing. We'll immediately retry the payment once you’ve done that. Billing details: Plan: Typeform Pro (monthly) Amount due: US $ 45.00 Attempted on: Nov 29, 2023 Next retry: Dec 2, 2023 What to expect: until the payment succeeds, your account will be in limited mode—forms will remain live, but premium features like logic jumps, file uploads, and unlimited responses will be temporarily unavailable. If you'd like help updating your card, choosing a different plan, or need assistance with anything else, our Support team is right here for you. Just visit the Help Center from your account or use the link below. We really value having you as part of the Typeform community, Anya, and we want to make sure everything stays seamless. Let’s get this sorted so you can keep creating with confidence. Warm regards, — The Typeform Billing Team

Subject: Welcome aboard, Luis — your Typeform Plus subscription is now live From: billing@typeform.com To: luis.garcia63@example.com Date: Thu, 21 Sep 2023 13:18:04 +0200 Hi Luis, Congratulations—and welcome to Typeform Plus! We’ve successfully activated your new annual subscription, and we’re thrilled to have you on board. You’re now equipped with everything Plus offers: unlimited responses, advanced logic jumps, custom branding, integrations with your favorite tools, priority support, and so much more. Here’s a snapshot of your subscription details: Plan: Typeform Plus (annual) Total paid: US $ 199.00 Date activated: Sep 21, 2023 Renewal date: Sep 21, 2024 Invoice number: TF‑20230921‑LG To view or download your full invoice, head over to your Account → Plan & Billing section whenever you'd like. Your subscription is now active, and your account is ready for you to explore all the premium features and capabilities that go beyond basic plan limits. We’ve also included a few custom resources to help you maximize your new tools: look out for emails from our team with ideas on using logic jumps, boosting completion rates, and integrating Typeform with your workflow. If you ever want advice, inspiration, or assistance, don’t hesitate to visit our Help Center or reach out to our Support team. Thank you for trusting Typeform to power your forms, surveys, and interactions. We can’t wait to see how you make Plus uniquely yours. Warmly, — The Typeform Team

Subject: We’ve processed your cancellation, Emilia — thank you for being with us From: billing@typeform.com To: emilia.rönnqvist42@example.com Date: Fri, 8 Dec 2023 10:54:33 +0100 Hi Emilia, We wanted to let you know that your request to cancel your Typeform Essential subscription has been processed successfully. Your plan will remain active until your current billing cycle ends — December 8, 2023 — and then it will move to the free plan at no additional cost. Here’s what this means: while your subscription is still active, you’ll continue enjoying all Essential features — unlimited forms, logic jumps, and access to response analytics — until midnight on your billing anniversary. After that, your account will shift to free, where you can still create forms and collect responses (with some feature limits). Any forms you’ve published will remain live, and your previous data will still be available for download. If you've changed your mind or want to reconsider upgrading, we’re here and happy to help. Just head over to Account → Plan & Billing, and you can easily pick a plan that suits your needs — or re-upgrade to Essential when you're ready. And of course, if you need support with anything, our Help Center is always open. Thank you, Emilia, for being part of the Typeform community. We appreciate the time and effort you’ve invested in building with us. We hope to see you again soon — and remember, even on the free plan, you can continue creating forms and learning with us whenever you’re ready. Warmly, — The Typeform Team
